overview: AFRICAN DREAMERS is a documentary on five African girls at a significant transition in their lives.  Five young women who live in four African countries that so many people leave, in the search for a better life.  Wangare and Grace, Deborah, Marveille and Mariam have decided to stay and try to change their difficult lives. They fight against prejudice, old beliefs, violence and ancient cultures that far too often violate the universal human rights. Through dusty roads, shanty towns and breathtaking landscapes, their stories have approached us. Faced with lifeâ€™s problems, big and small, each one of them is trying to reach her dream. A dream of redemption.
title: African Dreamers
